name: Cracked: A puzzle adventure game for touchscreen devices
blurb: Breaking and entering has never been this fun...or this legal.  Follow Gavin Pike IV as he discovers Harvest Park High School's dark conspiracy.

rewards.reward: Give any amount of money, starting with one dollar, and enjoy in-character Facebook updates from Gavin, live from Harvest Park.  Also, all supporters gain access to backers-only updates, with real-time telemetry on the progress of the game.

YOUR NAME IN LIGHTS: In the credits of the game, nestled proudly among the other supporters, your name will be visible to all.  Additionally, you'll receive two Cracked wallpapers to deck out your computer or touchscreen device.

STANDARD EDITION: In addition to everything above, a copy of the game is yours for the playing!  As an added bonus for preording the game, we'll mail you a thank you card, signed by the team.  Snail mail may be slow, but it shows just how much we love you.
FEELIE EDITION I: As well as everything from all previous donation tiers, you'll receive a limited edition art print, signed by the artist, or a signed copy of the Cracked Original Soundtrack
FEELIE EDITION II: Same as above, only you receive both a signed, limited-run art print and a signed copy of the Cracked Original Soundtrack.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION: Ever wanted your very own easter egg in a game?  Somewhere in Harvest Park High School, a supporter-only locker, emblazoned with the name of your choice, will be added to reward your contribution.  Plus, the collector's edition preorder comes with a lovingly decorated Cracked lockpick keychain, AND everything from all prior reward tiers.

UNLOCKED EDITION: Here's your chance to be like Gavin.  An entire, fully functional set of Cracked lockpicks is yours with this reward tier, plus everything from all previous tiers.  Note: Lightborne Lore does not condone breaking into locked places in the real world, unless you own those places and simply misplaced your keys.

THE SHIRT OFF MY BACK: This tier comes with a Cracked t-shirt!  You might as well look great while you're playing Cracked, practicing locksport with your new picks, listening to the game soundtrack, and admiring your signed art print.  Don't worry, we haven't actually worn any of the shirts.

CUSTOM ART I: That's all of the Cracked schwag we have to give, but the awesome doesn't stop there.  You'll receive everything from all previous tiers, as well as a custom created desktop background.  With your inspiration, our artists will create a one-of-a-kind wallpaper for your computer or touchscreen device!

CUSTOM ART II: Have a device that you'd love to make truly unique?  With this tier, you'll receive all the Cracked schwag, the custom wallpaper, and our artists will create a one-of-a-kind skin for your touchscreen tech, based on your inspiration.

PIKE FAMILY INHERITANCE: Art, inspired by you.  Schwag, lovingly created by us.  You'll receive all of it, AND an invitation to voice act for a Cracked character, in either this or a future episode.  Additionally, If you can make it to anywhere within a 3 hour radius of Athens, Ohio, the team will drive to you and treat you to dinner and high-fives.  Even if you can't make it, the raincheck never expires - if we ever cross paths in life, this offer stands.  Oh, and you get a free copy of every game Lightborne Lore ever makes.  You.  Rock.
